mapper.update:
UPDATE limit_rule
serial_number = #{serialNumber},
type = #{type},
name = #{name},
is_start = #{isStart},
standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId},
standard_unit_serial_number = #{standardUnitSerialNumber},
is_limit = #{isLimit},
su_limit_num = #{suLimitNum},
limit_time_type = #{limitTimeType},
limit_origin_time = #{limitOriginTime},
limit_stop_time = #{limitStopTime},
period_type = #{periodType},
user_limit_num = #{userLimitNum},
user_money_sum = #{userMoneySum},
create_userid = #{createUserid},
create_username = #{createUsername},
create_userip = #{createUserip},
create_usermac = #{createUsermac},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_userid = #{updateUserid},
update_username = #{updateUsername},
update_userip = #{updateUserip},
update_usermac = #{updateUsermac},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
limit_target = #{limitTarget},
su_comb_id = #{suCombId},
su_limit_amount = #{suLimitAmount},
company_type = #{companyType},
limit_unit = #{limitUnit},
is_user_limit = #{isUserLimit},
is_company_limit = #{isCompanyLimit},
company_limit_num = #{companyLimitNum},
company_money_sum = #{companyMoneySum},
is_store_limit = #{isStoreLimit},
store_limit_num = #{storeLimitNum},
store_money_sum = #{storeMoneySum},
WHERE id = #{id}
